text: Does anyone know if you can use pages that were built in the Website/Landing Page tool in the Content Staging tool. Basically, when we started redesigning a few pages for a client, they were all built directly into the Website tool and not in Content Staging. While I can just recreate them within CS (theres only like 5 pages), is there any way to clone or import the pages over?
If they're published pages they'll show up in the Unmodified section of CS where you can click to stage a clone of the page. I don't think you can stage Drafts from the Website Page tool though.

I have a client using custom styles for their forms and I created a stylesheet hosted in HubSpot. They are embedding these forms outside of HubSpot on their internal .asp system. But when I update a CSS rule the filename name changes I am assuming for cache. Is there a way to get an external URL that doesn't have the filename change that way I can just have the client clear browser cache to see the changes without them having to make a code change to update the new filename?
Can a HubSpot Chat bot be embedded on an external website that is not hosted with HubSpot? Can’t seem to fine a clear answer.
<https://wordpress.org/plugins/leadin/> looks like you can on WordPress sites...
As long as the HubSpot tracking code is on that page you should be able to
i have a chatbot on a SquareSpace site
Thanks! They don’t give you embed codes for the chat bots, so is it the embed from the chat that does it?

It looks like this is for Live Chat, but are Chat bots different? I know thy’re kind of melded together in HubSpot, but they are very different. I don’t think an actual bot will work on an external site?

I would assume it's all melded, so when creating your chatbot and editing the When options (which I feel like should be Where instead of When), you just put the URLs of the external site you want the bot on. The only thing that wouldn't work is the "is all pages" option since that will only target HubSpot hosted pages
Yes, the HubSpot tracking code is all you need for chat widget/bots
When importing a blog from wordpress to HubSpot is there some way to have it automatically enable featured images or do we have to manually do that on every blog post?

I have a group repeater with a min count of 6.  The fields.json file spits out 6 placeholders for it.  I am trying to fill them with some default values, but it is only working for the first one.  anyone else tried this?

not sure if you can set the other placeholder items.

In the design manager UX you can only set one
that might explain the trouble you’re having
